price: ئاللاھ ھىدايەت قىلغان ئادەم ھىدايەت تاپقۇچىدۇر، ئاللاھ گۇمراھ قىلغان ئادەم زىيان تارتقۇچىدۇر[178].
arabic: مَن يَهۡدِ ٱللَّهُ فَهُوَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِيۖ وَمَن يُضۡلِلۡ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man yahdi al-lahu fahuwa al-muh'tadī waman yuḍ'lil fa-ulāika humu al-khāsirūna
